Sentence: Hello aap kaise hain?
Main abhi busy hoon call you later.

Mujhe ek coffee chahiye.
Flight timing kya hai?
Rasta bahut lamba hai.
Chalo let's go for a walk.
Gaadi park kar do.
Next station kaunsa hai?
Mujhe late ho raha hai for office.
Aaj ka weather forecast keh raha hai ki heavy rain ho sakti hai.
Kya aap mujhe nearest metro station ka rasta bata sakte hain?
Online shopping karte waqt hamesha reviews check karne chahiye.
Laptop switch on nahi ho raha shayad charging problem hai.
Netflix par naya show aaya hai weekend par dekhenge.
Is application ko download karke apna profile update kar lo.

Recipe bahut simple hai bas saare ingredients mix kar do.
Video call par baat karte hain taaki clear communication ho.
Customer support ko call karke apni complaint register karwao.
Bhai jaldi aao movie miss ho jayegi because of this traffic!

Vacation ke photos upload kar diye hain check karke like kar dena.
